title: Copenhagen Café
subtitle: Menu + booking system with POS integration
summary: Revamped online presence with mobile-first design and integrated booking system that increased online reservations by 38%.
problem: The café struggled with low online bookings, slow website performance, and manual reservation management that led to missed opportunities.
solution: Built a fast, mobile-optimized website with integrated booking API, streamlined menu presentation, and automated table management system.

testimonials.author: Lars Andersen
testimonials.quote: Online bookings jumped immediately after the new site launched. The interface is so much easier for our customers.

title: NordTech Solutions
subtitle: B2B SaaS platform for manufacturing analytics
summary: Enterprise-grade analytics dashboard that helps manufacturing companies optimize their production workflows and reduce costs.
problem: Manufacturing teams needed real-time insights into production efficiency but were stuck with outdated reporting tools and manual processes.
solution: Developed a comprehensive SaaS platform with real-time dashboards, automated reporting, and predictive analytics for production optimization.

testimonials.author: Maria Eriksson
testimonials.quote: The platform transformed how we track production. We've reduced waste by 23% in just three months.

title: Danish Design Studio
subtitle: Portfolio showcase with e-commerce integration
summary: Elegant portfolio website with integrated e-commerce that showcases handcrafted furniture and increased online sales by 89%.
problem: The design studio had beautiful products but their outdated website wasn't converting visitors into customers, and managing inventory was a nightmare.
solution: Created a visually stunning portfolio with seamless Shopify integration, featuring high-quality imagery, smooth animations, and streamlined checkout.

testimonials.author: Henrik Nielsen
testimonials.quote: Our online sales have nearly doubled since the new website launched. The design perfectly captures our brand aesthetic.

title: FitTrack Pro
subtitle: Progressive web app for personal fitness tracking
summary: Progressive web app that helps users track workouts, nutrition, and progress with beautiful data visualizations and social features.
problem: Fitness enthusiasts needed a comprehensive tracking solution that worked offline and provided meaningful insights into their progress.
solution: Built a PWA with offline functionality, detailed analytics, social sharing, and subscription-based premium features for advanced tracking.

testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: FitTrack Pro keeps me motivated with its progress tracking. The offline mode is perfect for gym use.

title: Svendborg Bakery
subtitle: Local bakery with online ordering system
summary: Charming local bakery website with online ordering that increased weekly orders by 156% and streamlined pickup processes.
problem: The family bakery was losing customers to larger chains and needed a way to take online orders and build customer loyalty.
solution: Developed a warm, inviting website with online ordering, loyalty program integration, and pickup scheduling that reflects their artisanal brand.

testimonials.author: Anna Petersen
testimonials.quote: We can now take orders online and our customers love being able to skip the queue. It's been a game-changer for our business.
